Officially reissued by the greek label Cult Metal Classics on CD and vinyl
(handnumbered 700 copies) in 2002. The reissues contain 2 bonus tracks :
1. Hungry For Glory
2. Don&#039;t You Forget It
(this torrent does not contain the bonus tracks)

It has also been reissued by Mausoleum Records and Hellion Records, with
different cover arts.

A bootleg reissue from 1993 (together with Pantera&#039;s &#039;Power Metal&#039;) is
circulating.
